item.title: Breads
item.description: These Breads are reviewed by the IlmHub Team D’Italiano Suitable for consumption. Message by D’Italiano D’Italiano follows all FDA and CFIA regulations for reporting ingredients accurately. The oil and fat-based ingredients used in our products are vegetable-based and contain no animal by-products or alcohol. The mono and diglycerides is of a vegetable source. We use multiple vendors for some ingredients because of this we do not want to provide you inaccurate information.
